attributes.action: Introduce 'SLOW DOWN' or 'HIGH ACCIDENT RISK' signs plus Police speeding checks on the B1150 towards Horstead/Coltishall travelling from Norwich
attributes.additional_details:
There have been many accidents, some fatal, on the B1150 as your approach Horstead from Norwich. There is a particular bend in the road where these accidents occur.

Either road signs asking drivers to take care or slow down, a sign to highlight it as a risk area or a 'no overtaking' rule needs to be introduced. Police speeding checks would also be a good way to slow people down.

Too many people's lives have been affected by this bend.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
